title: After repeated nerfs Rek'sai's become a shell of a champion
body:
Her theme's really cool but translates poorly into gameplay after Riot outright gutted her fighter play style and turned her into a competitive knockup bot.

It's really saddening how being strong in competitive play can outright ruin a champion (see Azir and Kalista)
I'm inclined to believe that she'd soon be fit for a rework since everything cool and unique about her is being repeatedly nerfed to the point of her just building full tank and pressing W.

Kinda sad, and hell, I don't even play the champion :/

She just has nothing to offer in Solo Queue now unless you're as coordinated and skilled as pros. Literally everything about her has been nerfed just because she brings what pros want to the table - good clear, early ganks, vision control, mobility - her damage has been literally cut in half across the board, and her cooldowns and tunnels have been nerfed heavily as well. There are plenty of other junglers that dominate/are strong in both Solo Queue and Pro Play (Nidalee, Gragas, Elise comes to mind), and they haven't been nerfed nearly as heavily. She still dominates though as her mobility and burst are clearly above a lot of other jungles as she can start her battle at range and finish it up in melee without much problem. Plus her jungle defense and ability to invade is so strong still so i doubt the AA reset really hurt her that bad really.

it hurts her early clear's HP totals which makes invading or ganking early more dangerous for Nidalee. I don't think they wanted to remove her ability to clear effectively after first/second clear, but they wanted to cut her ability to clear 2 camps while taking almost no damage due to her ability to quickly dump damage in cougar form and then DPS during those shorts windows with a combination of AA resetting and kiting. Now she relies more heavily on kiting to keep her first clear healthy, which slows it down, or she can sacrifice health to clear more quickly which makes ganking/invading more risky.

Seems like they didn't want to kneecap her right before Worlds, but they wanted to give her clearer weaknesses early (since Nidalee already has the potential to fall off late in comparison to a lot of junglers who can provide tankiness or more reliable assassination to the team).

As I said in another thread, Rek'sai's design is one of the most unfortunate in League. What she offers is fucking huge in professional and very high elo play, and because of that she is forced to be utter dog shit for everyone else because if she was allowed to so much as do damage she'd be ridiculously OP where she is already one of the best junglers.
So she's basically reduced to a mobile ward that takes more than sweeper lens to clear.

In all fairness, a mobile ward that can farm the jungle and knock up multiple enemies at once, not to mention she can return to places she's already been to really quickly.

A lot of her power budget is in gathering information, but it's not like that only what she does; it's just that it's so much that when you lack the ability to make full use of it, she becomes dramatically weaker as she loses most of her advantages.

If she had mana costs then her overground Q and E wouldn't even be worth using at all anymore, at this point she only uses abilities aside from her knockup/teleport because she CAN. If they would just substantially nerf her early game knockup (or even remove it entirely) and as an exchange bring back her original fighter/assassin playstyle that she was meant for, I would be happy.
Without the knockup Rek'Sai would just be another damage without CC champion, and those need extreme survival mechanics or steroids. She would need major major buffs in every ability.

She doesn't need the CC removed entirely, it could be a brief root or even a heavy slow (maybe make the area she emerges in unstable and slows/applies grounded effect) but the pros have shown that the knockup is strong enough to use early level {{summoner:4}} for and I absolutely despise Rek'Sai being played as a flash-popup bot when her kit and thematic could be so much more.
